name: ClubhouseScroller
0:
”Alexa, open Daemon Message Scroller.”
”Alexa, ask Clubhouse Scroller to scroll hello world”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daemon message scroller
des: An Alexa skill to send messages to the Daemon Paddington Clubhouse message scroller.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
